name: part_007
file: tmp_【 #らでん生誕祭2025 】初！生誕ライブ～ここで出会ったのもなにかのご縁～【儒烏風亭らでん #ReGLOSS 】 [f5QgEZjH53Y]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Raden performs 'WWW' (Dabudabu) with guests Tanaka Hime and Suzuki Hina.
MC section with Raden, Tanaka Hime, and Suzuki Hina after the song performance.

subtitles.original:
いよいよいいかい？帰りもわっはっはっ！
笑いながらも通れんせ
subtitles.english:
Are you ready? Coming back is a big laugh!
Laughing as you pass through,

subtitles.original: 笑われながらもわっはっはっ！
subtitles.english: While being laughed at, laugh it off!

subtitles.original: あー うららレンタルのかわ
subtitles.english: Ah, the lovely rental skin,

subtitles.original: メンタルの皮剥ぎましょう
subtitles.english: Let's peel off the mental skin.

subtitles.original: ほら見なよ歌穂めら まったぬけは わっはっはっ！
subtitles.english: Look, Kaho-mera, a complete escape, wah-ha-ha!

subtitles.original: 変貌はクレイよ ならばレレレ
subtitles.english: The transformation is clay, then le-le-le,

subtitles.original: 変貌はツメ研いだよう
subtitles.english: Looks like the transformation sharpened its claws.

subtitles.original: ほら見な舞台指から漏れるぶら不和笑いあらら
subtitles.english: Look at the stage, disharmony leaking from the fingers, oh my laugh.

subtitles.original:
ウレキシを照明せよ
非現実世界へ出世も宝石もないが
subtitles.english:
Illuminate the joy!
In the surreal world, no fame or jewels, but...

subtitles.original: 戯れれるなら生まれ落ちの正体は
subtitles.english: If we can play, our true identity from birth is,

subtitles.original: I know where you're from アンダーグラソウゲンキョウ
subtitles.english: I know where you're from, Underground Sogenkyo.

subtitles.original: ダブダブ
subtitles.english: Dabudabu

subtitles.original: わっはっはっせーは ダブダブダ
subtitles.english: Wah-ha-ha say, Dabudabuda!

subtitles.original: 絡まったらっせーは リアルねのダボ
subtitles.english: Entangled, it's a double of the real world.

subtitles.original: キャラはあらわ ダボらませらばらっと出す生まれ変わるわ
subtitles.english: The character is exposed, making it double, popping out, being reborn.

subtitles.original: わっはっはっせーは ダブダブダ
subtitles.english: Wah-ha-ha say, Dabudabuda!

subtitles.original: 絡まったぼせーが 揺れるエゴエド
subtitles.english: The entangled shadow is the swaying Ego Edo.

subtitles.original: 笑いきり遊ばせ 暴からば再武屋 わっはっはっはー！
subtitles.english: Laugh all you want, if we rampage, it's Saibu-ya, wah-ha-ha-ha!

subtitles.original:
ののなかちょ みかちょめかちょ
なかちょなかちょ うぇいかちょ えぇかちょ
subtitles.english:
Nononaka-cho, Mikachome-kacho,
Nakacho-nakacho, Wey-kacho, Ee-kacho!

subtitles.original:
転がりゃ止まれんな 戻れんな
忘れんな 忘れんな 罪連打 ガチャガチャ
subtitles.english:
Once you roll, you can't stop or go back!
Don't forget, don't forget, a combo of sins, Gacha-Gacha!

subtitles.original: 狂おしけりゃまぁいいじゃん バラバラと都
subtitles.english: If it's crazy, that's fine, the capital in pieces.

subtitles.original: 轟々ととろは恨めしや百目 偶像あれ晴れ！
subtitles.english: Roaring like a dragon, the hundred-eyed grudge, let the idol shine!

subtitles.original: ダブダブ生まれあんな言葉で憎まれは誉れだと悟る眼鏡の裏
subtitles.english: Dabudabu born, being hated by those words is an honor, I realize behind the glasses.

subtitles.original: 危険な顔ぶれ晒されたら眠る死屍
subtitles.english: When the dangerous faces are exposed, the corpses sleep.

subtitles.original: もっと盛り上げていきましょう！
subtitles.english: Let's heat things up even more!

subtitles.original: ウォエーオー ウォオエーオー
subtitles.english: Whoa-eh-oh! Whoa-oh-eh-oh!

subtitles.original: 絡まった変境 暴れなや挑戦状
subtitles.english: Entangled borderland, rampage on, it's a challenge!

subtitles.original: はにかんだ転生はわかる 握るぜほいほいほい
subtitles.english: I understand the shy reincarnation, I'll grasp it, hoi-hoi-hoi!

subtitles.original: Ladies and gentlemen, please enjoy the paradise of WWW.
subtitles.english: Ladies and gentlemen, please enjoy the paradise of WWW.

subtitles.original: 薔薇色だ我は地はダブ
subtitles.english: Rose-colored am I, the ground is Double,

subtitles.original: ガタカブキバから零れるワルワルワラ
subtitles.english: Laughter spilling from the rattling Kabuki fangs, waru-waru-wara!

subtitles.original: ダブダブ
subtitles.english: Dabudabu

subtitles.original: わっはっはっせーは ダブダブダ
subtitles.english: Wah-ha-ha say, Dabudabuda!

subtitles.original: 絡まったらっせーは リアルねのダボ
subtitles.english: Entangled, it's a double of the real world.

subtitles.original: キャラはキャラだ あばかすざらになんどだって生まれ変わるなら
subtitles.english: A character is just a character, reborn as many times as it takes in the rough abacus.

subtitles.original: やっぱりせーは ダブダブダ
subtitles.english: After all, say, Dabudabuda!

subtitles.original: 絡まったぼせーが 揺れるエゴエド
subtitles.english: The entangled shadow is the swaying Ego Edo.

subtitles.original: 笑いきり遊ばせ さらば終わり輪廻や わっはっはっはー！
subtitles.english: Laugh all you want, farewell to the end, it's Samsara, wah-ha-ha-ha!

subtitles.original: ラスト！ ダブダブダブダブ
subtitles.english: Last one! Dabudabudabudabu!

subtitles.original: はい！ 薔薇色だ我は地はダブ
subtitles.english: Yes! Rose-colored am I, the ground is Double,

subtitles.original: ガタカブキバから零れるワルワルワラ
subtitles.english: Laughter spilling from the rattling Kabuki fangs, waru-waru-wara!

subtitles.original: はー！いえーい！
subtitles.english: Hah! Yay!

subtitles.original: お邪魔してまーす！おめでとうー！
subtitles.english: Sorry for intruding! Congratulations!

subtitles.original: おめでとうだよー！
subtitles.english: Congrats!

subtitles.original: ありがとうー！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: 息止めてもらって。ふー、ふー、ふー、ふー。
subtitles.english: I need to catch my breath... Phew, phew, phew, phew.

subtitles.original: というわけで、というわけで、えー、なんとゲスト3組目は、
subtitles.english: So, so... for our third set of guests,

subtitles.original: ヒメヒナのお二人に来ていただきましたー！
subtitles.english: We have the two of HIMEHINA joining us!

subtitles.original: いえーい！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: お邪魔しておりますー！ご挨拶しますか？
subtitles.english: Thanks for having us! Shall we introduce ourselves?

subtitles.original: しましょう！
subtitles.english: Let's do it!

subtitles.original: いくよ、せーの！
subtitles.english: Here we go, one, two...!

subtitles.original: はろー、田中ヒメです！
subtitles.english: Hello, I'm Tanaka Hime!

subtitles.original: 鈴木ヒナです！
subtitles.english: I'm Suzuki Hina!

subtitles.original: 二人合わせて、ヒメヒナです！
subtitles.english: And together, we are HIMEHINA!

subtitles.original: よろしくー！いえーい！
subtitles.english: Nice to meet you! Yay!

subtitles.original: おめでたー、おめでたー！
subtitles.english: Happy birthday, happy birthday!

subtitles.original: ほ、本物...
subtitles.english: The... the real deal...

subtitles.original: あれ、ご本人？ご本人？
subtitles.english: Wait, are you the real one? The real one?

subtitles.original: あ、なすなす、それなに、それなに
subtitles.english: Ah, Nasunasu, what's that? What's that?

subtitles.original: 落ちゆく花びらを表現しました
subtitles.english: I was expressing falling flower petals.

subtitles.original: みんなでやっとこうか、めでたいしね
subtitles.english: Let's all do it, it's a happy occasion after all.

subtitles.original:
めでてー、めでてー。
本当にめでたいのかこれ？分からんｗ
subtitles.english:
Congrats, congrats.
Is this really celebratory? I have no idea lol.

subtitles.original: はい、ということでございまして、えー、
subtitles.english: Right, so, anyway,

subtitles.original: 『WWW』を、ダブダブを、一緒に歌わせていただきました！
subtitles.english: We sang 'WWW' (Dabudabu) together!

subtitles.original: ありがとうー！ずっとこの曲が大好きで！
subtitles.english: Thank you! I've always loved this song!

subtitles.original: 嬉しいー！
subtitles.english: I'm so happy!

subtitles.original: 大好きー！
subtitles.english: We love it too!

subtitles.original: ねー、一緒にできてよかったー！嬉しくて！
subtitles.english: Right? I'm so glad we could do this! I'm so happy!

subtitles.original: でね、あの、伏線もちゃんとあったんですよね。
subtitles.english: And you know, there was actually a foreshadowing.

subtitles.original: 一度コラボにお呼びいただきまして。去年コラボかな？
subtitles.english: You invited me to a collab once. Was it last year?

subtitles.original: コラボね、去年12月？
subtitles.english: The collab, last December?

subtitles.original: 11月末ぐらいだね
subtitles.english: Around the end of November, I think.

subtitles.original: ぐらいだね、そこで『WWW』が好きだからと言ってたのが...
subtitles.english: Right around then. Back then, I said I liked 'WWW'...
